item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: Counseling Center Announces Walk-in Hours for Spring 2025
item.description: Rensselaer’s Counseling Center invites students to meet with a counselor without a formal appointment during designated walk-in hours! Two walk-in hours are available each day: from 10am to noon on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, and from 2:00pm to 4:00pm Tuesdays and Thursdays. Walk-in counseling is also available on a first-come, first-served basis on days when classes are in session; students who cannot attend the walk-in times can call (518) 276-6479 to schedule an appointment.

item.title: McKinney Keynote: Creative Writing Craft Talk Slated for April 8
item.description: Please join us on Tues, 4/8 at 2PM in EMPAC Studio Beta for a craft talk by award-winning novelist and McKinney keynote speaker, Lan Samantha Chang. Chang is the winner of an Anisfield-Wolf Book Award for Fiction and a PEN Open Book Award. She’s received fellowships from the National Endowment for the Arts, the Guggenheim Foundation, and an award from the American Academy of Arts and Letters. Chang will be discussing the craft of fiction and her writing process. Registration is not required.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere”
item.description: Thursday, February 20, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.

item.title: MBA for Professionals Informational Webinar Scheduled for February 11
item.description: Date: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 5:00 PM - 5:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D. as he reviews this innovative project-based, online MBA for professionals program. Participants will learn to lead from every aspect of an organization with real-world MBA experience, prepare to lead dynamic and innovative organizations, and engage, involve, motivate, and lead others to reach their fullest potential.

item.title: Rensselaer Faculty and Staff Webinar - Flipping Your Classroom - February 18
item.description:
Tuesday, February 18, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - This session will discuss the practice of moving traditional in-class lectures onto the web by creating engaging, media-rich content that student’s access before, during, or after class. Class time is refocused, allowing students to work on tasks and problems that apply the concepts they studied independently. Please register
